snippet: After giving up her dream of becoming a dancer, Rachel Cooper came to realize that being an arts administrator “can be just as creative and fulfilling as being an artist.”
abstract: Preoccupations column features Asia Society director Rachel Cooper discussing her performing-arts administration career; she says administration can be just as creative and fulfilling as being an artist.
lead_paragraph: After giving up her dream of becoming a dancer, Rachel Cooper came to realize that being an arts administrator “can be just as creative and fulfilling as being an artist.”

headline.print_headline: The Trek From Performer To Producer
headline.seo: The Transition From Performer to Producer
headline.main: The Trek From Performer to Producer
